message: Accept this offer and we can split the money fairly.
Let's split it 50/50 and be done with it!
I'd like to get a bit more. Can you offer me 55%?
I'll take 55% and let you have the rest. It's a fair deal.
I'll give you 60% and keep 40% for myself. It's a compromise!
Alright, 60% is a fair compromise. I accept your offer.
